statusDetails.message:
1 expectation failed.
Response body doesn't match expectation.

error: object has missing required properties (["creation_time","last_mod_time","userAddress","user_contact_number","user_email_id","user_first_name","user_id","user_last_name"])

    missing: ["creation_time","last_mod_time","userAddress","user_contact_number","user_email_id","user_first_name","user_id","user_last_name"]

  Actual: {"status":"409 CONFLICT","message":"User already exist with same email id"}
